title: Discovering compatible parents in neighborhood
content:
Scenario: Discovering compatible parents in neighborhood
    Given Sarah needs connection to other parents
    And compatible values and needs matter for effective support
    When the neighborhood_elohim analyzes parent compatibility
    Then it should identify parents with similar-aged children
    And it should match based on compatible care values
    And it should connect parents who could provide mutual support
    And Sarah should be introduced to potential parent network
    And the system should break down isolation
    And neighborhood parent community should be facilitated
